title: Ruo Chun and Jing Ming - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   College/University   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Smart Couple   Teamwork   Time Skip
author: Jiu Yue Xi   玖月晞
description:
Du Ruo, a poor student in the mountainous area, came to Beijing to attend university and met Jing Ming, a robot genius from the sponsor's family. The ugly duckling met the white swan. One has inferiority complex, while the other is arrogant, prejudice against arrogance, engineering woman versus engineering man, constantly colliding with each other. 

Du Ruo was gradually attracted by the excellent Jing Ming and was secretly in love, but was rejected. From then on, she folded up her heart and worked hard to improve herself, gradually attracting Jing Ming's glance and confession, However, at this time, Du Ruo only wanted to improve herself.>
